languages.text: "Можете рассчитывать на мою искренность — мой язык связан клятвой служения. Что именно интересует вас на Футфоле, этой обители коммерсантов, торговцев ксенотехом и — немножко — бандитов?"

traits.locale_text: "Можете рассчитывать на мою искренность — мой язык связан клятвой служения. Что именно интересует вас на Футфоле, этой обители коммерсантов, торговцев ксенотеком и — немножко — бандитов?"

languages.text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"
languages.original_text: "Можете рассчитывать на мою искренность — мой язык связан клятвой служения. Что именно интересует вас на Футфоле, этой обители коммерсантов, торговцев ксенотехом и — немножко — бандитов?"

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xeno-tech traders, and — only slightly — bandits?"
"Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xeno-tech traders, and — only slightly — bandits?"
"Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xeno-tech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"
"Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xeno-tech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"
"Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"

languages.text: 「ご安心を。率直に申し上げよう。この唇は奉仕の誓いで固く結ばれている。商人、異星技術のトレーダー、それから…ほんの少しの、コソ泥の住処であるフットフォールで、いったい何に興味をお持ちかな？」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"

traits.locale_text: 「ご安心を。率直に申し上げよう。この唇は奉仕の誓いで固く結ばれている。商人、異星技術のトレーダー、それから…ほんの少しの、コソ泥の住処であるフットフォールで、いったい何に興味をお持ちかな？」

languages.text: “请放心，我会如实相告，毕竟我受服务誓言的约束。究竟是什么原因，让您对落脚港，这个到处都是商人和异形科技贩子，还有一小撮强盗的地方感兴趣呢？”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"

traits.locale_text: “请放心，我会如实相告，毕竟我受服务誓言的约束。究竟是什么原因，让您对落脚港，这个到处都是商人和异形科技贩子，还有一小撮强盗的地方感兴趣呢？”

languages.text: «No se preocupe, no diré nada. Mis labios están sellados por mi juramento de cargo. ¿Qué le interesa exactamente en Paso, morada de mercaderes, comerciantes de xenotecnología y, aunque cada vez menos, bandidos?».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"

traits.locale_text: «No se preocupe, no diré nada. Mis labios están sellados por mi juramento de cargo. ¿Qué le interesa exactamente en Paso, morada de mercaderes, comerciantes de xenotecnología y, aunque cada vez menos, bandidos?».

languages.text: « Vous pouvez compter sur mon honnêteté ; je suis lié par serment. Que souhaitez-vous savoir sur Castel, cette magnifique station où se côtoient négociants, marchands de xénotechnologies et une poignée de bandits ? »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez compter sur mon honnêteté ; je suis lié par serment. Que souhaitez-vous savoir sur Castel, cette magnifique station où se côtoient négociants, marchands de xénotechnologies et une poignée de bandits ? »

languages.text: "Seid versichert, ich werde offen antworten – obschon ich an den Dienstschwur gebunden bin. Was genau möchtet Ihr über Footfall wissen, diese Heimstatt von Händlern, Xenotech-Verkäufern und – einigen wenigen – Banditen?"
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"

traits.locale_text: "Seid versichert, ich werde offen antworten – obschon ich an den Dienstschwur gebunden bin. Was genau möchtet Ihr über Footfall wissen, diese Heimstatt von Händlern, Xenotech-Verkäufern und – einigen wenigen – Banditen?"

languages.text: "Dürüstçe cevaplayacağımdan şüpheniz olmasın, dudaklarım hizmet yemini ile bağlıdır. Tüccarlara, zeno teknolojisi tacirlerine ve bir iki tane de hayduda ev sahipliği yapan Binliman hakkında neleri merak ediyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I will be candid — my lips are bound by the oath of service. What exactly interests you on Footfall, this abode of merchants, xenotech traders, and — only a few — bandits?"

traits.locale_text: "Dürüstlüğümden şüpheniz olmasın, dudaklarım hizmet yemini ile bağlı. Tüccarların, zeno teknolojisi tacirlerinin ve sayıca az birtakım haydutların bulunduğu Binliman hakkında ilginizi çeken nedir?"
